name: MANAB KALYAN KHADI GRAMODYOG SAMITY
briefDescription: Our Organization Manab Kalyan Khadi Gramodyog Samity Is a Rural area based organization and its devoted itself in serve of these rural and needy people . We work on Khadi Industries  development , Rural area development and cleanliness , Health awareness, Cultrural and Social Awareness and Health checkup camp and literacy campaign. We try our best to serve our society as per our strength.
